Implementation considerations for ANC guideline recommendations

B.2.3. Routine antenatal 
cardiotocography (CTG) 
• If routine antenatal CTG is being conducted• If being conducted, instruct providers to omit this from practice, due to lack of evidence. • N /A • N /A
